message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DM, cs.DB, cs.CL

The paper deals with the problem of determining the optimal number of clusters in a dataset, which is a common problem in machine learning and data mining. The proposed algorithm uses cluster validity measures to automatically merge clusters and find a single and nearly optimal clustering structure. This makes it relevant to several sub-categories of computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), data mining (cs.DM), databases (cs.DB), and computational linguistics (cs.CL). However, given that the focus is on clustering and optimization, we believe that cs.LG and cs.AI are the most likely sub-categories, followed by cs.DM, cs.DB, and cs.CL.
